thread.title: Inside Zandhotel, Holland's £110-a-night sand hotel pop-up - in pictures
thread.title_full: Inside Zandhotel, Holland's £110-a-night sand hotel pop-up - in pictures

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Inside Zandhotel, Holland's £110-a-night sand hotel pop-up - in pictures
text:
MORE... 
Zandhotel has opened two elaborate £110-a-night pop-up hotels made entirely from sand to celebrate Holland's annual Sand Sculpture Festival in Brabant. The hotels, located in Oss, in southern Holland, and Sneek, in the north of the country, are open until the end of September 2015. The en-suite rooms have running water, showers, and comfortable beds, and are decorated with elaborate sand sculptures. 
The Medieval feel of the sand hotels — with their castle sculptures complete with mottes and crenelated battlements — is inspired by the “journey through time” theme of the sand sculpture festival.
